ygData.subject: Re: Only Dark race ah? Can a Halfling join anot?
ygData.msgSnippet: i think cleric will be a killer in pvp.... imagine at later stages... u can cancel magic... can heal... can cure poison/ disease... n can melee reasoably
ygData.messageBody:
i think cleric will be a killer in pvp.... imagine at later stages... u can
cancel magic... can heal... can cure poison/ disease... n can melee
reasoably good.... who can touch u? necro is out bcos dot r too slow...
think with the new warrior update... they will be a good option as well...

Nic
----- Original Message -----
From: Chen Lizhi <polarcoordinates@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 30, 1999 10:39 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Only Dark race ah? Can a Halfling join anot?


> From: "Chen Lizhi" <polarcoordinates@...>
>
> Can a Halfling Druid join anot? I planned on playing one leh. Treat me as
> some kind of disillusioned Halfling that bends of destruction lah :p
> If cannot then I think I will try a DE Warrior or Rogue, depends on
whether
> I can trust my PvP skill anot. If not, I'll be a Cleric.
>
